Contains all AMD PowerExpress-related functions exposed by ADL for Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and above); 32bit and 64bit platforms. More...

Detailed Description

Contains all AMD PowerExpress-related functions exposed by ADL for Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and above); 32bit and 64bit platforms.

All functions found in this file can be used as a reference to ensure the specified function pointers can be used by the appropriate runtime dynamic library loaders. This header file is for AMD internal use only.
